name: I must kill...: Fresh Meat
description: I must kill...: Fresh Meat is a light horror story adventure game based on a sad story of a butcher. One day, one night and one accident will bring his misty past and memories to light.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 3,0 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any with 256MB or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any with 512MB or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
